original_text: And in every province, wherever the king's command and his decree reached, there was great mourning among the Jews, with fasting and weeping and lamenting, and many of them lay in sackcloth and ashes.
korean_text: 왕의 명령과 조서가 각 지방에 이르매 유다인이 크게 애통하여 금식하며 울며 부르짖고 굵은 베 옷을 입고 재에 누운 자가 무수하더라

sentences.original_text: wherever the king's command and his decree reached
there was great mourning among the Jews
and many of them lay in sackcloth and ashes
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 중 많은 사람이 굵은 베옷과 재 위에 누웠더라
